metadata.title: CVE-2018-12098 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** The liblnk_data_block_read function in liblnk_data_block.cin liblnk through 2018-04-19 allows remote attackers to cause aninformation disclosure (heap-based buffer over-read) via a crafted lnkfile. NOTE: the vendor has disputed this as described in libyal/liblnkissue 33 on GitHub.

criterions.comment: liblnk package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
